entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
